name: GroundsKeeper 2
summary:
Survive the invasion of the supernatural, the robots, the monsters.. the world needs you!
★Paranerds 9/10 – “It’s fast-paced, easy to play and addicting, all the while being charming, funny and filled with fantastic music and art”★TouchArcade 4/5 – “Groundskeeper2 is an entertaining action game that will keep you busy blasting bots for bits and bobs for a while”
